data.text: @AmyLynnR22 @emd526 @JodyPalmer1119 Same 😂😄 so sad!
@jlynnmartinez @emd526 @JodyPalmer1119 Haha I'm blocked by him on Twitter

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Another bitter ex at it again I see. Didn't work out too well for Peter's ex Brittany. She got burned with her b.s. and ran and hid. Let's see how long before this one does the same.😏😏😏
@Stephma4 @footballqueen52 @EricaPe65515147 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen To each their own 🙂

@Miz_DeeDs @footballqueen52 @EricaPe65515147 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Eh, not me. I don’t mess with players and their stupid games. I wouldn’t have dated him in the first place, but if I did, I would’ve been done the second he wanted to go on Winter Games, if not before that. I think she was also caught up in the idea of him being somewhat “famous”

@footballqueen52 @EricaPe65515147 @Stephma4 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Based on the interview I think part of her did question things during the relationship but he was using his charm to reassure her and she wanted to trust him. Like I said when you are “in love” your judgements gets cloud and you don’t always think logically.
@footballqueen52 @Stephma4 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen I meant to say “would not question any suspicion...”
@EricaPe65515147 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen @lukepell @JoeGrocery Not a fan of grocery Joe. He does not seem to have much personality. Maybe watching him on Paradise will change my view.
@Marion754 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen nobody forcing you to listen

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen @MissHollyAllen did a great job on the podcast! I can’t say I was ever a Luke fan; he always seemed like a sleeze-ball, especially after I saw him on Winter Games. I don’t think Holly needs to feel bad for staying with him -we all do dumb things for love!

@footballqueen52 @Stephma4 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen "Love" sometimes cloud people's judgement and sense of logic. I also think he was manipulating her with his charm so she would question any suspicions and negative thoughts/emotions she was having about the relationship.

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Finally listen to the podcast. I totally misjudged her😶 She'd definitely more down-to-earth & humble than expected😊 I could tell she was nervous about speaking up but I'm glad she did. Luke doesn't deserve her. He is a total misogynistic jerk. Glad she moved on❤️👍🏻
@jlynnmartinez @AmyLynnR22 @LukePellFanClub @JodyPalmer1119 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen @LukesAngelz  https://t.co/kdxN9i2mBq
@AmyLynnR22 @LukePellFanClub @emd526 @JodyPalmer1119 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen @LukesAngelz 😳 oh wow, that’s not surprising
@jlynnmartinez @LukePellFanClub @emd526 @JodyPalmer1119 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen @LukesAngelz Oh and his new dating app video on Instagram really !!?? https://t.co/xf7b5GhJEA

@LukePellFanClub @jlynnmartinez @JodyPalmer1119 @AmyLynnR22 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen @LukesAngelz You mean blind Stans? Definitely haven't gained. Hilarious & pathetic. Keep being complicit for a narcissistic sociopath who has proven to have emotionally abused MULTIPLE women. Disgusting. #hiluke
@jlynnmartinez @emd526 @JodyPalmer1119 @AmyLynnR22 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen @LukesAngelz We’ve gained followers ✌🏻 Have a blessed day!
@emd526 @JodyPalmer1119 @AmyLynnR22 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Maybe ask his loyal fans😂😂 @LukePellFanClub @LukesAngelz
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Just adding that i finished the podcast - great job as always and Holly was amazingly collected and kept it classy all the way. Thanks for sharing.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Good interview. It seems like she wanted to get a lot off her chest. I hope she’s really over him and won’t go back.
@Laura_Henc @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Because as Steve has pointed out on his website, depending on the amount of followers one sponsored post can bring $10k.
@jlynnmartinez @JodyPalmer1119 @AmyLynnR22 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen I got blocked. What's he down to now?

@footballqueen52 @Stephma4 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen You would be surprised how many of us stay with someone bc we want them to be the person they portray to the outside world. It’s as if we think it can be willed into happening lol.
@cchow56 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen He must not be too busy if he has time in his day just to block all these millions of people. 😂
@cchow56 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Exactly!
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Holly you are amazing!! Thank you for being so open and honest and real with your feelings. I absolutely adored listening to this podcast! ❤❤❤❤
@cchow56 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen He blocked me too😂 sad day!
@HaymakerHattie @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Yea not okay either way
@stearlgirl @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen You may be right about that.
@MissHollyAllen Last piece of advice : Stick with the trout!  🤣🤣🤣
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen As always, another fantastic podcast! Thank you Holly for sharing your story and Steve, keep em coming!
@Marion754 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Nobody is forcing you to listen to the podcast...? 🤷
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Anyone else see a physical resemblence to @kaitlynbristowe ? Just me? @RealitySteve
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Worth the listen! Loved her raw honesty and ownership over the situation. Enjoyed a spike seltzer instead of wine😂 & her "friend" is thirsty AF.
@footballqueen52 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Right like how many times was she gonna let his bullshit slide 🙄
@cchow56 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Lmao!! What. A. Loser.
@AnnaGon76715141 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Not a sociopath, but narcissistic personality disorder

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Wow. Luke fits the qualities of narcissistic personality disorder to a T. Look up articles on the narcissist and the empath. Holly sounds great. Hopefully she won't fall for one again.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen I wish I was as beautiful and interesting as Holly...you were already chosen through the casting process and I genuinely hope that you get to be the bachelorette💕
@emilys7789 @SuzieSouza99 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen She knew
@AmyLynnR22 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Yea why!
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen That was great!  So honest!  Wow!  I couldn’t stop listening.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen What the hell

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Just read up on the podcast (can't wait to start listening). The comments made by @lukepell 's "friend" Travis Rice are the most deplorable statements about women I've ever read. If anyone doubts Luke is a POS, check the company he keeps. Explains a lot.

@MissHollyAllen @RealitySteve Bahahahahahaha! There were a couple different times in the audio where I thought you might have been refilling. 😉 I hope you've found lots of support the past 24 hrs. You deserve better and it sounded like you had already determined that.

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Thank Holly for your raw honesty. took so much courage to share your story and you did it to try to help others. I hope women who hear this understand better the symptoms of an abusive relationship and the downside of empathy in a relationship.  Wishing you happiness!  #beenthere

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen loved it. so interesting. gotta say I am pretty shocked about the strategy stuff for winter games etc. I just don´t get why one would play with people´s hearts just for instagram followers. in a few years instagram is gonna be dead and then what?!
@BusterMann1011 @RealitySteve I think you can hear me pour my second glass around the 45 minute mark. 🍷
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Holly is very well spoken and handled this with more grace than I would have. Luke Pell is a scumbag.

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Ok...I know I've reached my posting capacity but this girl is pretty damn Amazing!! Gorgeous, Smart, and very Humble!!
#imnoastalkeripromise https://t.co/2inTserBm7
@HaymakerHattie @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen I didn’t hear that!? I thought she said he always said he loves her size and body..she’s small
@SuzieSouza99 @Ashmommy85 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen She sounds so lovely. @lukepell is a dick
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Holly sounds awesome. F Luke.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Great Interview.  It's easy to write off so many of these women as flakey and stupid.  Can't judge a book by its cover.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Honestly I wasn’t that excited to listen, I’m pretty neutral about this storyline, but this was a captivating story, I couldn’t stop listening!
@jlynnmartinez @AmyLynnR22 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen 😮
@JodyPalmer1119 @AmyLynnR22 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen He’s pissed about all the followers he’s losing for sure. That’s all that matters to him.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Do people even care about this?

@AnnaGon76715141 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen The way he treated Stassi on the reunion show was the big sign if it for me. He was so cold to her when he didn’t think people were looking. He didn’t even look at her.
@AmyLynnR22 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen I told one of his followers to listen to this on his posts on IG, he blocked me 🤷🏻‍♀️😄

@RealitySteve Enjoyed the podcast. Don't know how much rose 🍷@MissHollyAllen went thru over the 90 min, but appreciate the level-headed analysis, thoughtful replies & stories shared. Best advice to her is stay strong & continue to look ahead. We've all been there at some point in our lives.
@AnnaGon76715141 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen You're absolutely right!!! I was married to one for 15 years...They have no soul.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen yep, @lukepell is definitely cancelled. Be prepared for that Instagram following to drop buddy. #unfollow
@AnnaGon76715141 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen + honestly, he makes the other guys in this show sound like sweethearts.

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Men like this need to be exposed. Good for you @misshollyallen it takes courage to do what you did. I respect you and wish you so much happiness. You deserve it. What a disgusting man. Hopefully saving another girl from this garbage.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Fantastic interview. Holly was well-spoken. Thank you for sharing her story!
@Marion754 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Solution: don't listen.
@AnnaGon76715141 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen I was going to also write that he sounds like a sociopath

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Just listened. I went into this completely objectively as I had no feelings on Luke one way or the other. Now I feel I can accurately say, according to this podcast, that he portrays all the traits of a classic sociopath. I'm not using hyperbole here. I mean that 100%.
@SuzieSouza99 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen She acted so sad that she let him go!! But I think she knew for sure
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Excellent podcast! Holly is very believable, articulate, and intelligent and Steve is hysterical as usual! Great job guys!
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen At least he's playing in an appropriate venue!!! Haha https://t.co/Xogbmtgtzb
@emilys7789 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Totally agree!! When he pulled her aside right before rose ceremony, I knew he was pouring it on thick in a panic!! Sooo glad Jo Jo saw right through it.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Thank you for sharing, Holly. You are beautiful. Good luck with everything!
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen So proud of you girl
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Have you noticed he deleted pretty much all of his pictures on Instagram
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Great podcast! She is beautiful inside and out from what I can tell from one podcast and deserves so much better!

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen This interview is riveting & the story behind it bananas...but when you mention Luke's criticisms of Holly, you say "you're not large or fat like he seems to be assuming." Would it have been okay for him to say that if she was?
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen The best interview ever! Thank you @MissHollyAllen! Appreciated your honestly!!
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Can not wait to listen to this one!!

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Not physically attractive enough for him? Wtf is going through his head he’s gorgeous! And to think this was the kinda guy I imagined Jordan to be whenever JoJo’s season was still airing. This guy is a pig.
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen It’s not up yet on Apple podcasts?

@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen I haven’t listened yet but just reading the summary-he told JoJo he loved her I think to make us feel sorry for him when he got eliminated so he would be a shoe in for bachelor. Great performance😒
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen #shespretty!
@Marion754 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen You don’t need to know. He’s not forcing you to read/listen to it. 🤷🏻‍♀️
@Marion754 @RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Then don’t listen? 🤷🏻‍♀️
@RealitySteve @MissHollyAllen Why do we need to know all this.    I sure don't.
